<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">2ec698d7836242105b4b9750ceaad311</macroponent><name>Form refresh</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    api.setState('formRefreshed', {timestamp: Date.now()});
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-12 09:40:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>229b3cb0833202105b4b9750ceaad399</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Form refresh</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Worklog" source="x_1397836_worklog">4bf448df83ee02105b4b9750ceaad383</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Worklog">4bf448df83ee02105b4b9750ceaad383</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_229b3cb0833202105b4b9750ceaad399</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-12 09:40:50</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
